headline: Dow (DOW) Is Up 15.4% After Q4 Loss, Layoffs And Net-Zero Push - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: Dow Inc. recently reported fourth-quarter 2025 results showing sales of US$9,460 million and a net loss of US$1,543 million, alongside plans for large-scale layoffs and the completion of a US$2.07 billion share repurchase program announced in 2022. At the same time, Valmet announced Dow had ordered turnkey process analytical solutions for its Path2Zero project in Alberta, highlighting Dow’s ambition to build a net-zero emissions ethylene cracker and derivatives complex. Against this...
